caption.center: (Re MARSHALL COUNTY v. Fob JAMES, etc., et al.).

opinion.attorneys:
T.J. Carnes of Carnes Carnes, Albertville, for petitioner
J.R. Brooks of Ford, Caldwell, Ford Payne, Huntsville, for respondent City of Huntsville Hospital Bd. d/b/a Huntsville Hospital, etc
M.R. Nachman, Jr., Spec. Counsel to the Governor of the State of Alabama, Montgomery, William J. Samford, Jr., Legal Advisor to the Governor of the State of Alabama, Opelika, Glen F Manning, Spec. Counsel to the Governor, Huntsville, and Thomas McAlpine, Gen. Counsel for the Dept. of Corrections, Montgomery, for respondents
opinion.opinion_text:
Writ of mandamus denied on authority of Madison County,Alabama v. James, 406 So.2d 398 (Ala. 1981)
WRIT DENIED
TORBERT, C.J., and FAULKNER, ALMON and ADAMS, JJ., concur
